hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) passed by a woman who was sitting and weeping beside a grave and said to her, "Fear Allah and be patient

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ لِلْمَرْأَةِ عِنْدَ الْقَبْرِ اصْبِرِي
chapter.eng-name: The saying of a man to a woman at the grave, "Be patient"
